title: Magic arrow +1
contents: text | You have a +1 bonus to Attack and Damage Rolls made with this piece of magic arrow.
text | Wheather you hit or miss, the arrow is no longer magical.

title: Minor magic arrow - Fire
contents: text | This arrow's tip is formed of red crystal. When fired, the arrow turns into a red ray.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage.
text | Wheather you hit or miss, the arrow disappears and damages normal bow.

title: Minor magic arrow - Acid
contents: text | This arrow's tip is formed of orange crystal. When fired, the arrow turns into a orange ray.
text | On a hit, the target takes 1d10 acid damage.
text | Wheather you hit or miss, the arrow disappears and damages normal bow.
